name: Trivia: Sports
overview: Trivia, from Commodore, this is the software package that asks the questions everybody wants to answer. It's the who's, what's, Where's and why's from all around the galaxy and even back in time. It's the game that tests your mental mettle about General Trivia, Science, Sports or History. You can play by yourself or against an opponent. 1000 questions for those who take trivia seriously.
